name: Vinted
address_export: Vinted, UAB Svitrigailos st. 13 LT-03228 Vilnius, République de Lituanie
sanction_details_en:
On 2 July 2024, in cooperation with the CNIL, the Lithuanian data protection authority imposed a fine of 2,385,276 euros on Vinted UAB for several infringements:
* The company refused to erase data solely on the grounds that individuals did not cite one of the criteria provided for by the GDPR in their erasure request;
* The company did not inform complainants of all the reasons for the refusal;
* The company unlawfully implemented “shadow banning”, a method that consists of making a user’s activity invisible to other users when that user is considered malicious, without informing them, in order to encourage them to leave the platform;
* The company was unable to prove that it had properly responded to certain access requests.
privacy_policy_quote: Les prestataires de services suivants étant établis en dehors de l’Espace économique européen, vos données sont par conséquent susceptibles d’être transférées en dehors de l’Espace économique européen. Dans ces cas précis, les données à caractère personnel sont protégées par les prestataires de services qui s’engagent à respecter les clauses contractuelles types de l’UE pour transférer les données, telles qu’approuvées par la Commission européenne
privacy_policy_quote_en: The following service providers being established outside the European Economic Area, your data may therefore be transferred outside the European Economic Area. In such cases, personal data are protected by the service providers, who undertake to comply with the EU standard contractual clauses for data transfers, as approved by the European Commission.
transfer_destination_countries_en: United States, Lithuania and United Kingdom

sanctions.title: Marché en ligne : sanction de 2,3 millions d’euros à l’encontre de VINTED
